items.checkin_comment: Much lighter than it looks. A crisp lager with a little extra malt

beer.beer_description:
Introducing our latest creation - the Black Rice Lager. Brewed with a unique blend of black malts and rolled rice, this Lager offers a rich, smooth taste with a hint of roast character and a clean finish.

Perfect for those seeking a distinctive yet refreshing beer experience. Raise a glass to innovation and enjoy the bold flavours of our Black Rice Lager.

Cheers!

Fermentables: Pilsner, Rolled Rice, Carapils, Midnight Wheat, Black Malt

Hops: Motueka, Saaz, Warrior

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 300 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below.  Try 5 more for Level 61!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 10 years on Untappd!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 230 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 47.

items.checkin_comment: It is freezing today and this suits it wonderfully !

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 120 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 25!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 80 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 17!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 15 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.checkin_comment: Very moorish, pleasant roasted flavour and a nice clean finish

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 85 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 18!

items.checkin_comment: Hops up front, an interesting sharpness to it, good bitterness. Falls away at the tail.

beer.beer_description:
Introducing our first brew after a long hiatus, a New Zealand Pilsner. Brewed in Western Sydney this beer is hopped up with Nelson Sauvin and Mandarina Bavaria hops, on a base of Pilsner Malt with a touch of Carapils. Designed to be refreshing delight - the key characteristics are a clean body and a gentle malt sweetness, combined with hints of gooseberry and that unique NZ hop spice. It's a symbol of our return and a beer that goes down easy on a hot afternoon. Cheers to new beginnings!

Hops: Nelson Sauvin, Mandarina Bavaria, Warrior
Malt: Pilsner, Carapils, Acidulated

items.badge_description: The power of pilsner! Part of our first round of “Super Style” badges in 2023, celebrate this crisp, clean lager, which ranked as the 10th most checked-in style of 2021 with over 1M check-ins. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.
